DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effective enoxaparin dose strategy medically ill , morbidly obese patient . This study include adult patient great 18 yrs age admit Grady Hospital Atlanta , GA . Potentially vulnerable patient prisoner , child , pregnant woman enrol study . Study participant contact person study personnel inclusion criterion meet . Written inform consent obtain person hospitalize . Once patient consent give enoxaparin blood sample draw . The data collect electronic medical record access username password publicly available . The data identifiable upon collection keep password protect file computer lock office . The data de-identified data analysis study personnel access code link identifier subject . A HIPAA waiver request access exist data order identify patient enrollment . All data collect office hospital . The study participant ' burden minimal dependent time consent process since morbidly obese patient would receive blood sample collection regardless participation study .
DOC.criteria: Planned treat twice daily enoxaparin BMI > = 40 kg/m2 < 18 year age CrCl < 30 ml/min Pregnancy Prisoner Active bleed Already receive 3 consecutive dos enoxaparin Use therapeutic enoxaparin 5 consecutive day within last 3 month
